name: csm-music-engine
description: Music project featuring Web MIDI and Web Audio.

scripts.build: rimraf build && tsc && set NODE_ENV=production&& browserify build/main.js | uglifyjs -m > build/main.bundle.js && node-sass --source-map true src/style.scss build/style.css && echo Build complete.
scripts.build-debug-with-sass: tsc && browserify --debug build/main.js > build/main.bundle.js && node-sass --source-map true src/style.scss build/style.css && echo Build complete.
scripts.build-debug: tsc && browserify --debug build/main.js > build/main.bundle.js && echo Build complete.
scripts.test: echo Not test driven, lol && exit 0

author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>
